name: Nobody's Journey
description:
⚔️ Nobody’s journey is a game about starting a medieval life as a nobody and build up to ascend. ⚔️

🛡️ Choose carefully between all options each turn, when you have the chance to pick the action of a random drawn card from your deck (when you have one) or activate a card from the world’s deck. 🛡️

🌄 Cards have “revealed”, “activated” and “leaving” effects, each indicated by icons on it.  As you progress building up your influence, strength or wealth, you level up the world’s deck cards accordingly with more adventures, quests and meaniful choices in every corner.  🌄

🛑 The objective is to reach level 7 and don’t fall behind the danger value. The danger level goes up with a variety of cards and when you level up, so be careful. 🛑
